pre.code: define "No VTE Prophylaxis Device Order": (["ServiceRequest": "Venous foot pumps (VFP)"] union ["ServiceRequest": "Intermittent pneumatic compression devices (IPC)"] union ["ServiceRequest": "Graduated compression stockings (GCS)"] ) DeviceOrder where DeviceOrder.status = 'completed' and DeviceOrder.doNotPerform is true

tr.td: See the patterns page for implementation and usage patterns.
